attributes.action: Review all video games for children under 16 before it is launched in country
attributes.background:
There are lots of self harming games or anti social games in the market . Children are been exposed to negativity at early age which harms productivity and well being of future generations 
This appeal is review all video games from child mental growth and impact prospective

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Video games are already given an age rating so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
